title: Moving on from #metoo (full interview) - Louise Mazanti PhD
description:
How can we move on as men and women in the wake of the #metoo campaign. Psychotherapist and relationship expert Louise Mazanti PhD talks to Rebel Wisdom founder and journalist David Fuller.

For more details on Louise Mazanti: https://www.mazantilousada.com/

They also discuss the viral interview between Jordan Peterson and Cathy Newman on Channel 4 News - see it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aMcjxSThD54&t=1303s

For more great content, go to: http://rebelwisdom.co.uk/

And please help us make more great content by supporting us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rebelwisdom
